Reviews.Content: great value and location I had to work for a project in Chatswood and i found this property. Annam Suites just took over the management of this building and they are doing a great job. Loved Thomas the Front Desk, he was very helpful.Will be back next month
Reviews.Author: mrslucky

Reviews.Content: Nicht zu empfehlen       Hausnummer und Werbung war da, doch keinerlei Telefonnummer!
Reviews.Author: pittiStralsund
